participant_1.name: Julien
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, with a strong sense of individuality.
participant_1.background: I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft. I love pandas. I want a modern and stylish home that reflects my vibrant personality. I enjoy eating crêpes, a popular dish from my homeland, France. I listen to music in my hearse before starting my day.

participant_2.name: Maria
participant_2.personality: Driven and family-oriented, with a love for music and a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family. I have a pet husky. I have a diverse ethnic background, but I identify most with my Filipino heritage. I haven t spoken to my family in years. I gave my doberman a treat for being a good boy.

content.text: Nice, I'm a musician too. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different genres, but I'm mostly into rock and blues.
Cool, me too. I love playing guitar and singing.
What kind of guitar do you play?
I play a Fender Stratocaster. It's my favorite guitar.
Nice, I've always wanted to play a Stratocaster.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, play guitar, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun.
I do, I'm a pretty happy person.
